task.title: Fresh-eyes review of MCPWorker MCP migration

events.content: Migration has functional regressions despite passing tsc: Migration has functional regressions despite passing tsc

raw.question: Migration has functional regressions despite passing tsc
raw.chosen: Migration has functional regressions despite passing tsc
raw.reasoning: Several MCP tools are still exposed but adapter methods now return unsupported/no-op results, and inbox depends on cloud-only calls without fallback

retrospective.summary: Fresh-eyes review found MCP broker migration compiles but has major runtime regressions and failing tests
